summary: Certified fitness professional with leadership and strong people skills. Trained as NESTA Certified Fitness Trainer, TRX and Kettlebell certifications. Experienced in group and private training, high-performance and weight loss regimens, plus office management, massage therapy, and membership management. Passionate about helping clients achieve lasting health and fitness goals.

experience.title: Professional Fitness Trainer, Group Instructor
experience.description: Lead group and private classes. Administer tests using InBody machine, measure body composition and explain results. Provide advanced testing options such as aVO2 Max and/or RMR testing. Classes include HIIT, strength training, kickboxing, circuit training, plyometrics and agility training, aqua fitness, and restorative stretch.

experience.title: Manager/Certified Personal Trainer
experience.description: Part-time Office Manager and Professional Fitness Trainer. Responsibilities include answering phones, scheduling appointments for chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, acupuncturist, skin specialist; maintaining office accounting and insurance billing; retail product management; Beach Plyo program development; geriatric training programs; coached youth in track and field, soccer, swimming and cross country; managed celebrity clients.

experience.title: Massage Therapist
experience.description: Owned and managed an independent massage therapy business out of the Total Woman Gym; advertised and maintained a serene massage space; provided therapeutic massage services with professional customer relations.

experience.title: Professional Triathlete
experience.description: Competed professionally across the United States and internationally; trained with performance experts in track and field, swimming, cycling and triathlon; sponsors included Saucony, Oakley, Danskin, Power Bar, Hamilton Bikes, and Impex.

experience.title: Hostess
experience.description: Set up tables and stations, answered phones, made reservations, tasted and ensured quality, and seated guests; developed confidence, poise and strong customer service in an upscale restaurant environment.

experience.title: Membership Manager
experience.description: Sold, managed and updated gym memberships; conducted phone calls and meetings with members; ensured member satisfaction and positive experience.
